subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=痨|alt=勞-Sichuan sense,撈-Sichuan sense}}
From {{och-l|勞|to toil}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|TCM}} [[internal]] [[injury]] caused by [[overstrain]]ing
# [[tuberculosis]]; [[pulmonary]] [[tuberculosis]]
# {{lb|zh|Southwestern Mandarin|dialectal Gan}} to have an [[upset]] [[stomach]] because of the lack of [[fat]]s in one's [[diet]]; to [[crave]] [[meat]]
# {{lb|zh|Xiang|of plants}} to [[wither]] (in the sun)
# {{lb|zh|Xiang|of a person}} to be [[dispirited]]; [[depressed]]

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|瘡癆|癆病|癆氣|癆傷|癆病腔子|癆病殼子|癆病半切|癆腸刮肚|癆病鬼|癆瘵|癆症|癆蟲|童子癆|美人癆|肺癆|話癆|防癆|饞癆|骨蒸癆|骨癆}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=痨|alt=澇-Sichuan}}
Possibly related to {{och-l|療|to cure}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Compare ancient Chu dialect {{och-l|瘌|to be poisoned by medication}}. Cognate to {{cog|lus|ru||bark, roots, leaves or fruit which can be used to poison fish}}, {{cog|kac||mə-rau|fishing by stupefying fish by poisonous vines}}, {{cog|my|ရိုး||fish poison}} ({{zh-ref|Starostin}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|ancient Northern Yan|&|Joseon region}} to be [[poison]]ed (by medication)
# {{lb|zh|Jianghuai Mandarin|Southwestern Mandarin|Gan|Xiang|transitive}} to [[poison]]
# {{†}} [[painful]]
